Package uk.co.zodiac2000.subscriptionmanager.service

Class SubscriptionService

java.lang.Object
uk.co.zodiac2000.subscriptionmanager.service.SubscriptionService
@Service @Transactional(readOnly=true) public class SubscriptionService extends Object
Service facade for Subscription aggregates.

      public SubscriptionService()

  • Method Details

    • getSubscription

      public Optional<SubscriptionResponseDto> getSubscription(long id)
      Returns the subscription identified by id or an empty optional if not found.
      Parameters:
      id - the subscription id
      Returns:
      a response DTO representing the subscription

    • deleteSubscription

      @Transactional(readOnly=false) public void deleteSubscription(long id)
      Deletes the subscription identified by id.
      Parameters:
      id - the subscription identifier

    • createSubscription

      @Transactional(readOnly=false) public Optional<SubscriptionResponseDto> createSubscription(NewSubscriptionCommandDto commandDto)
      Creates a new Subscription aggregate root and persists it. Returns a response DTO representing the new subscription.
      Parameters:
      commandDto - command DTO representing the new subscription
      Returns:
      a SubscriptionResponseDto

    • updateSubscriptionDates

      @Transactional(readOnly=false) public Optional<SubscriptionResponseDto> updateSubscriptionDates(long id, SubscriptionDatesCommandDto commandDto)
      Updates the start and end dates of the Subscription identified by id. Returns a response DTO representing the updated subscription. If the subscription doesn't exist then an empty optional is returned and no change is made to the state of the system.
      Parameters:
      id - the subscription identifier
      commandDto - command DTO representing the new subscription dates
      Returns:
      a SubscriptionResponseDto

    • updateSubscriptionContentIdentifier

      @Transactional(readOnly=false) public Optional<SubscriptionResponseDto> updateSubscriptionContentIdentifier(long id, SubscriptionContentIdentifierCommandDto commandDto)
      Updates the content identifier associated with the Subscription identified by id. Returns a response DTO representing the updated subscription. If the subscription doesn't exist then an empty optional is returned and no change is made to the state of the system.
      Parameters:
      id - the subscription identifier
      commandDto - command DTO representing the updated content identifier
      Returns:
      a SubscriptionResponseDto

    • suspendSubscription

      @Transactional(readOnly=false) public Optional<SubscriptionResponseDto> suspendSubscription(long id)
      Suspends the subscription identified by the id argument. Returns the state of the updated subscription or an empty Optional if not found. Throws an IllegalStateException if the subscription cannot be suspended. See Subscription#suspend for details.
      Parameters:
      id - the subscription identifier
      Returns:
      the updated subscription
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the subscription cannot be suspended

    • terminateSubscription

      @Transactional(readOnly=false) public Optional<SubscriptionResponseDto> terminateSubscription(long id)
      Terminates the subscription identified by the id argument. Returns the state of the updated subscription or an empty Optional if not found. Throws an IllegalStateException if the subscription cannot be terminated. See Subscription#terminate for details.
      Parameters:
      id - the subscription identifier
      Returns:
      the updated subscription
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the subscription cannot be terminated

    • unsuspendSubscription

      @Transactional(readOnly=false) public Optional<SubscriptionResponseDto> unsuspendSubscription(long id)
      Unsuspends the subscription identified by the id argument. Returns the state of the updated subscription or an empty Optional if not found. Throws an IllegalStateException if the subscription cannot be unsuspended. See Subscription#unsuspend for details.
      Parameters:
      id - the subscription identifier
      Returns:
      the updated subscription
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the subscription cannot be unsuspended
